#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
int main()
{
     int tcase;
     scanf("%d",&tcase);
     while(tcase--)
     {
          int p,y;
          scanf("%d",&p);
          scanf("%d",&y);
          unsigned long long int temp;
          temp=p;
          for(int i=2000;i<y;i++)
          {
               temp=(temp%MOD)*(temp%MOD);
               temp%=MOD;
          }
          printf("%llu\n",temp);
     }
}
